data.name: Door Kickers Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Door Kickers
Original soundtrack of Door Kickers, Rock Paper Shotgun’s “Bestest Best Tactics of 2014”. Perfect music to your high octane strategic endeavors.

Composed by George Vlad

Tracklist
1. Counter Measures 02:32
2. Run and Gun 01:34
3. Kicking Doors 01:04
4. Distraction Devices 01:01
5. Perimeter Breach 02:45
6. Asymmetric Tactics 03:25
7. On Sight 02:42
8. Methods of Entry 02:54
9. Close Quarters Combat 03:01
10. High Risk 03:13
11. Vital Target 02:54
12. Coordinated Surveillance 1:54
13. Hazardous Devices 2:54
14. Tactical Intervention 1:53
15. Uncertain Outcome 2:54

Includes files in Mp3 and Flac format. Once purchased, files will be available in your SteamApps folder under ...Steam\steamapps\common\DoorKickers\Soundtrack

data.short_description: Original soundtrack from the hit SWAT command game Door Kickers. In Mp3 and Flac format.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP3
  • Processor: Intel Pentium IV 2.6 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: An OpenGL 2.0 graphics adapter. NOT SUPPORTED: Radeon X1950, Intel GMA, Intel Gxx, Intel Qxx, Intel Mobile 9xx, Intel HD Graphics 1 or older.
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1366x768 minimum display resolution
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or AMD Athlon 64 X2 5600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia Geforce 9xxx / AMD Radeon HD / IntelHD 3000 series or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: A resolution of 1920x1080

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.5
  • Processor: Intel Pentium IV 2.6 GHz or equivalent
  • Graphics: An OpenGL 2.0 graphics adapter. NOT SUPPORTED:Radeon X1950, Intel GMA, Intel Gxx, Intel Qxx, Intel Mobile 9xx, Intel HD Graphics 1 or older.
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1366x768 minimum display resolution
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OSX 10.8
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or AMD Athlon 64 X2 5600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia Geforce 9xxx / AMD Radeon HD / IntelHD 3000 series or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: A resolution of 1920x1080

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: An OpenGL 2.0 graphics adapter. Radeon X1950, Intel GMA, Intel Gxx, Intel Qxx, Intel Mobile 9xx, Intel HD Graphics 1 or older.
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1366x768 minimum display resolution
